title: Lessons Learned Automation: ML-Based Extraction of Actionable Insights from Incident Postmortems
summary: This work presents a machine learning approach to automatically extract actionable insights and recommendations from incident postmortem documents. The system identifies root causes, contributing factors, and recommends preventive measures using NLP and knowledge graphs. Application to 150+ postmortems demonstrates 85% recommendation accuracy and reduces analysis time by 60%.
